original_title: Welcome to the Show/Intermission in the Third Dimension/The End of the Show
overview: A “trilogy” of surreal and funny cartoons, produced exclusively to book-end the first year of The Animation Show’s travelling theatrical tour.
tagline: A “trilogy” of surreal and funny cartoons, produced exclusively to book-end the first year of The Animation Show’s travelling theatrical tour.
title: Welcome to the Show/Intermission in the Third Dimension/The End of the Show
